record.author: Ross Clark, Mary Salisbury
record.classification: Austronesian, Malayo-Polynesian, Central-Eastern Malayo-Polynesian, Eastern Malayo-Polynesian, Oceanic, Central-Eastern Oceanic, Remote Oceanic, Central Pacific, East Fijian-Polynesian, Polynesian, Nuclear, East, Central, Tahitic

record.annotation: to turn from side to side, not go straight (of canoe)
back, behind [not certain that this is 'back' as in bodypart -MW]
suck on straw, suckle on breast
to shoot with bow and arrow
to stab (or stick), pierce with a thrust
